news_header: Justin Hotard becomes the new CEO of Nokia, bringing over 25 years of experience in international technology management.
news_original_title: Tällainen on Nokian uusi toimitusjohtaja Justin Hotard: oli edellisessä työssään reilun vuoden
news_text: Justin Hotard has been appointed as the new CEO of Nokia, effective April, succeeding Pekka Lundmark. With over 25 years of experience in leading international technology companies, Hotard currently manages Intel's data center and artificial intelligence business in Silicon Valley. He has previously worked at Hewlett Packard Enterprises and has been recognized for his expertise in artificial intelligence and supercomputers. Hotard emphasizes the importance of AI in Nokia's future and expresses honor in leading a company with a rich history of innovation.
